The operation is to create a new solid body. Part 2: Construct a cylindrical object with a rectangular opening on one side. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with euler angles (0.0, 0.0, 0.0) and translation vector (0.0, 0.0833, 0.1667). The operation is to cut existing material. Final Shape: The final shape will be a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side. The prism is centered on a white background. The dimensions of the rectangular prism are 0.75 x 0.5 (width and height) and the curved side has a radius of 0.333 (determined from the second part) with a length and height same as the prism.</description>
